```{r setup, klippy, echo=FALSE, include=TRUE,message=FALSE}
library(mathjaxr)

library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)
### Read Data into SPSS
```


```yaml

GET DATA
  /TYPE=XLSX
  /FILE='C:\path\to\yourfile.xlsx'
  /SHEET=name 'Sheet1'
  /CELLRANGE=FULL
  /READNAMES=ON.
```



```yaml
GET DATA
  /TYPE=TXT
  /FILE='C:\path\to\yourfile.csv'
  /DELCASE=LINE
  /DELIMITERS=","
  /ARRANGEMENT=DELIMITED
  /FIRSTCASE=2
  /VARIABLES=var1 F8.2 var2 F8.2 var3 F8.2.
```

### T-test code

```yaml
T-TEST GROUPS=gender(1 2)
  /VARIABLES=math_score
  /CRITERIA=CI(.95).
```


### Chi-square code

```yaml
CROSSTABS 
  /TABLES=variable1 BY variable2
  /STATISTICS=CHISQ
  /CELLS=COUNT EXPECTED.
```

### Pearson Correlation

```yaml
CORRELATIONS 
  /VARIABLES=var1 var2
  /STATISTICS=DESCRIPTIVES.
```


### Spearman Rank Correlation

```yaml
NONPAR CORR 
  /VARIABLES=var1 var2
  /PRINT=SPEARMAN.
```

### Partial Correlation

```yaml
PARTIAL CORR 
  /VARIABLES=var1 var2
  /CONTROLLING=control_var.
```

### Scatterplot in SPSS

```yaml
GRAPH 
  /SCATTERPLOT(BIVAR)=independent_variable WITH dependent_variable.
```

### Bivariate Regression

```yaml
REGRESSION 
  /DEPENDENT=dependent_variable
  /METHOD=ENTER independent_variable.
```
